name: Earth Onboarding Project
description:
Left hand fingers (pinky to thumb): Q, W, E, R ,V

 

Right hand fingers (thumb to pinky): N, U, I, O, P

On behalf of the Earth Onboarding Project company, your job is to take newcoming aliens on a tour guide. Show them around and dont let them fall. We dont want to have any negative reviews! Use your translating skills and learn the newcomers language. 

CREDITS: 

Guide text from https://www.theguardian.com/science/brain-flapping/2015/oct/16/welcome-to-earth-a-travel-guide-for-aliens

Tomáš Selmeci - Programming

LaRon - Art

Music and sounds: freesound.org
